description: Creation of a means of vehicular access to the front of the house
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Site location plan - received 9th August 2021, Proposed plan - received 1st December 2021) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - A splay of 2.4m x 2.4m shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.

Condition : 4 - The hard standing hereby permitted shall be made of porous materials, or include provision made to direct surface water run-off to a permeable or porous area or surface within the application site in accordance with DCLG Guidance on Permeable Surfacing of Front Gardens (2008) before the development hereby permitted is first occupied or brought into use. The run-off shall not drain into any other foul or surface water drainage system.

Condition : 5 - Prior to first use of the crossover hereby approved a wall no greater than 0.6m high shall be erected along the remainder of the front boundary (i.e. the area not covered by the crossover opening itself and the pedestrian gate) and the wall shall be retained for the lifetime of the development.
